value="<b>Grafana<br></b>[Container]<br><br>Platform for querying, visualizing, and altering on metrics, logs and traces" </mxCell> <mxCell id="E0Uc8rr-MVdLSepH3jDu-7" value="Fetches logs from" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" forwards logs" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;gradientColor=#97d077;strokeColor=#82b366;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="330" width="200" height="130"
